name: Microsoft 5CJ-00005 Wired Optical Mouse
Features: [Right-handed control - Your right hand will shift your laptop into high gear., Five customizable buttons - Do more and get it done faster., BlueTrack Technology - Works on virtually any surface, from the hood of a car, carpets, to park benches., Detent scroll wheel - Effortless comfort and accuracy., Wired reliability - Designed for trouble-free performance, eliminating the worry of battery life.]
